Room.Name: Eastern Bluffs
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the eastern edge of Uland Island, looking over the bluffs.
Room.LongDescription: The Respitial Sea stretches out before you to the east. The coast of Mordor lies in that direction, and the great city of Oceancrest has a seaport there. The bluffs look impossible to scale, but down below is a glistningly white beach. The rutted road which leads east also turns and makes its way for a short distance to the north, but it soon disappears because of little use and fast growing jungle.
